statements: SELECT * FROM SpendData WHERE amount > 100
SELECT id, date, amount FROM SpendData WHERE category = 'Groceries' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, category, description FROM SpendData WHERE category = 'Utilities' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM SpendData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT id, amount, description FROM SpendData WHERE category = 'Entertainment'
SELECT id, date, amount, category, description FROM SpendData WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM SpendData WHERE category = 'Groceries' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT id, category, amount FROM SpendData WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT id, amount, category FROM SpendData WHERE description LIKE '%shopping%' AND amount < 50
SELECT description, category, date FROM SpendData WHERE category IN ('Dining', 'Entertainment')
SELECT * FROM spend_data WHERE category = 'Food'
SELECT id, date, amount FROM spend_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM spend_data WHERE date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT vendor, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM spend_data GROUP BY vendor
SELECT * FROM opportunities WHERE status = 'open'
SELECT * FROM spend_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, category, amount FROM spend_data WHERE category='Groceries' AND vendor='Walmart' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT id, opportunity_name, description, savings_estimate FROM opportunities WHERE status='approved' AND savings_estimate > 5000 ORDER BY opportunity_name;
SELECT category, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM spend_data GROUP BY category HAVING AVG(amount) > 500;
SELECT * FROM opportunities WHERE status='implemented' OR status='approved' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM SpendData;
SELECT spend_id, product_name, category FROM SpendData ORDER BY spend_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, spend_amount FROM SpendData WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM CostReduction WHERE estimated_savings > 5000;
SELECT improvement_id, process_name, efficiency_score FROM ProcessImprovements ORDER BY efficiency_score DESC;
SELECT product_name, spend_amount FROM SpendData WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY spend_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT reduction_id, opportunity_description, estimated_savings FROM CostReduction WHERE estimated_savings > 5000 ORDER BY estimated_savings ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProcessImprovements WHERE efficiency_score BETWEEN 0.7 AND 0.9 ORDER BY improvement_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT product_name, category FROM SpendData WHERE product_name LIKE 'Apple%' AND category IN ('Electronics', 'Technology') ORDER BY category, product_name;
SELECT improvement_id, process_name FROM ProcessImprovements WHERE LENGTH(process_name) > 15 ORDER BY process_name ASC LIMIT 4;
SELECT * FROM SpendData WHERE id = 1
SELECT opportunity_name, opportunity_description FROM Opportunities WHERE id = 3
SELECT id, cost_type, amount_saved FROM CostReduction ORDER BY amount_saved DESC
SELECT date, amount FROM SpendData WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT process_name, description FROM ProcessImprovements
SELECT * FROM SpendData WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, opportunity_name FROM Opportunities WHERE opportunity_description LIKE '%innovative%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, cost_type, amount_saved FROM CostReduction WHERE amount_saved < 500 ORDER BY cost_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProcessImprovements WHERE LENGTH(description) > 50 ORDER BY process_name DESC;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM SpendData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM spend_data;
SELECT vendor_name, unit_price, quantity FROM spend_data ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT category_name, description FROM cost_categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT opportunity_description, suggested_cost_savings FROM cost_reduction_opportunities ORDER BY suggested_cost_savings ASC;
SELECT process_name, estimated_time_savings FROM process_improvements LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM spend_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, purchase_date FROM spend_data WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, unit_price, quantity FROM spend_data WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT category_name, description FROM cost_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM cost_reduction_opportunities WHERE suggested_cost_savings > 5000 ORDER BY suggested_cost_savings DESC, opportunity_id ASC;
